name: Tower of Time (itch) (RedOwlGames)
description:
You’ve climbed this far! Now it’s time to beat the boss. He’s pretty indecisive and changes his mind… every ten seconds!

Keyboard Controls

WASD - Move Around

SPACEBAR - Attack

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Attack

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON & DRAG - Look

Gamepad Controls

LEFT STICK - Move Around

BUTTON SOUTH - Attack

RIGHT STICK - Look Around

What’s your high score?
